definition.script:
pipeline { agent { node { label 'build_slave' } } environment { APPLICATION_NAME = "CAMPP_Backend" NOTIFYUSERS = 'syedza@newtglobal.com' BUILD_DETAILS = "
Job Name: ${env.JOB_NAME}
Build Number: ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}
Build URL: ${BUILD_URL}" } options { timestamps() timeout(time: 1, unit: 'HOURS') buildDiscarder(logRotator(numToKeepStr: '10')) } stages { stage ("Deployment to server"){ steps { echo "Deploy Artifacts to Nexus" dir ('/home/jenkins/workspace/CAMPP/CAMP_Backend'){ nexusPublisher nexusInstanceId: 'nexus', nexusRepositoryId: 'camp_backend', packages: [[$class: 'MavenPackage', mavenAssetList: [[classifier: '', extension: '', filePath: 'scanner/target/scanner-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar']], mavenCoordinate: [artifactId: 'scanner', groupId: 'com', packaging: 'jar', version: '0.0.1-SNAPSHOT']]] } } } } /* post { always { emailext subject: "Jenkins Job Report For ${APPLICATION_NAME} - ${currentBuild.currentResult}", body: "BUILD DETAILS: ${BUILD_DETAILS}
BUILD STATUS: ${currentBuild.currentResult}", to: "${NOTIFYUSERS}" } }*/}
